title: RIOT should try to preserve some of the stances/angles of heroes when they update their splash art
body: E.G. look at the Commando skin for Jarvan 4, RIOT should not change the stance or action of Jarvan if they ever redo the splash art for that skin, just make it sharper and improve the quality, what do people think?

replies.body:
riot should only alter the base skins
not really fair to change other skins that are paid for( ie freilord ashe skin sucks now and has for a while)
especially since some people only by them for the splash art as opposed to the igm

Why though, do you want like say WW's new splash to remain his current posing if that's coming any time soon?

Or do you want Mord's splash to be of his original pose in the old splash? Or Sion? Or Soraka?

I don't see an issue with upgrading the pose if there are better ones available for that particular champ.

I don't welcome all splash updates, I personally don't like for example Shyv's new one much but on the other hand I dig the ones like the new Soraka or Singed.
for MOST skins, the old pose looks clunky and could do with replacement, but for some specific skins such as the J4 commando skin, the old stance should be preserved
